description.gm: Epitome When you epitomize The Sickness, a sprawling cemetery manifests near Harrowheart. A sickly, unpleasant caretaker tends to this cemetery. This caretaker knows the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blight], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Call Spirit], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Create Undead] rituals, and can teach them to the PCs. Skill checks attempted at the cemetery to perform any of these rituals gain a +2 item bonus.
description.value:
Suit Shields (Con)

Alignment neutral evil

The Sickness represents disease of the body or soul. As long as The Sickness is invested, it grants you a +2 item bonus to saving throws against disease. If you roll a success on a save against a disease, you get a critical success instead. If you are 20th-level, the item bonus increases to +3.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You flick a corner of the card, as if casting aside a tiny pest or fleck of filth from its surface; you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Abyssal Plague]. If you are at least 15th-level, you can instead choose to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spiritual Epidemic]. Regardless of which spell you cast, the level of the spell is half your level, rounded down (minimum 6th level), and the save DC is equal to your class DC.
